```{r}
all_indices <- lapply(example, function(x) {

#input as count  
  
  #print("count-based")
  # tabula
  #print("berger")
  berger <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    berger <- index_berger(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  
  #print("brillouin")
  brillouin <- "error"  
  tryCatch({
    brillouin <- index_brillouin(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  
  #print("mcintosh")  
  mcintosh <- "error"    
  tryCatch({
    mcintosh <- index_mcintosh(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })

  #print("shannon")
  shannon <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    shannon <- index_shannon(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
    
  #print("simpson")
  simpson <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    simpson <- index_simpson(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  
  
  # Desctools
  #print("gini")
  gini <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    gini <- Gini(x, unbiased=FALSE)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  
  
#input as freq
  #print("freq-based")
  # iqv 
  #print("ada")
  ada <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    ada <- ADA(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  
  #print("mda")
  mda <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    mda <- MDA(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  #print("dm")
  dm <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    dm <- DM(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  #print("vs")      
  vs <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    vs <- VA(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  #print("hrel")     
  hrel <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    hrel <- HREL(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  #print("b")      
  b <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    b <- B(x)
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  
  # calcDiv
  #print("hil_div")
  x_rowise <- t(matrix(x))
  hil_div <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    hil_div <- (calcDiv((x_rowise), type = c("HillDiv")))[1,1]
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  #print("hil_even")
  hil_even <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    hil_even <- (calcDiv((x_rowise), type = c("HillEven")))[1,1]
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  #print("pielou_even")     
  pielou_even <- "error"
  tryCatch({
    pielou_even <- (calcDiv((x_rowise), type = c("PielouEven")))[1,1]
  }, error = function(e) {
     #print(e)
  })
  
  return(list(
    berger = berger,
    brillouin = brillouin,
    mcintosh = mcintosh,
    shannon = shannon,
    simpson = simpson,
              
    gini = gini,
      
    ada = ada,
    mda = mda,
    dm = dm,
    vs = vs,
    hrel = hrel,
    b = b,
              
    hil_div = hil_div,
    hil_even = hil_even,
    pielou_even = pielou_even
  ))
  
})

```



```{r}
all_df <-  data.frame(t(matrix(unlist(all_indices),
                               nrow = length(all_indices[[1]]))))
rownames(all_df) <- unlist(lapply(example,paste,collapse = "_"))
colnames(all_df) <- names(all_indices[[1]])
```


```{r}
View(all_df)
```


```{r}
write.csv(all_df,file = "output/diversity_example.csv",row.names = TRUE)
```


#log variance 
```{r}
example_2 <-read.csv(file = "data/diversity_example_2.csv",row.names = 1,header = FALSE)

example_2_1 <- example_2[,1:4]
example_2_2 <- example_2[,5:8]
example_2_3 <- example_2[1:3,5:8]
```
```{r}
library(easyCODA)
```

```{r}
example_2_1
example_2_2
```


```{r}
CLR(example_2_1,weight = FALSE)
CLR(example_2_2,weight = FALSE)
CLR(example_2_3,weight = FALSE)

LR.VAR(CLR(example_2_1,weight = FALSE))
LR.VAR(CLR(example_2_2,weight = FALSE))
LR.VAR(CLR(example_2_3,weight = FALSE))
```


```{r}
CLR(example_2_1,weight = TRUE)
CLR(example_2_2,weight = TRUE)
```


